member.name: T:Prepatcher.DefaultValueAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the default value of a PrepatcherField

member.name: T:Prepatcher.InjectComponentAttribute
member.summary: Marks a PrepatcherField for automatic injection of components from target class

member.name: T:Prepatcher.PrepatcherFieldAttribute
member.summary: Marks the accessor of a requested new field

member.name: T:Prepatcher.ValueInitializerAttribute
member.summary: Specifies a method supplying the initial value of a PrepatcherField. The method has to be in the same class as the PrepatcherField.
